name: Surf'n'Turf
description:
Surf'n'Turf is a small 2D game created for the GMTKJam 2021.

You are a little birb who catched a fish and tries to get it to the coast.

Don't let your fish dehydrate or hit too many boats!

Tools & Licences:

Music: "Whale Watcher" by  Apoxode  - http://dig.ccmixter.org/files/Apoxode/63647

Made with SDL2 - https://www.libsdl.org/

Graphic Assets created with Affinity Designer - https://affinity.serif.com/de/designer/
